title: Huge 1,393 SQFT Open Floor Plan Loft Near Lake Merritt
posting_body: ['Lake Merritt District East Lake Lofts is a steel reinforced brick and mortar warehouse – with loft-style residences.', 'Loft 206 features an open floor plan with a positive energy vibe & the sunlight keeps you feeling like you are outdoors.', 'This lovely 1-bed 1-bath, 1,393 square feet condo is available for immediate move-in!', 'Be the first to enjoy the all-new flooring, paint, fixtures, washer, dryer, etc.', 'Well located near Lake Merritt, this home is within walking distance to all restaurants, bars, coffee shops, shopping centers, Lake Merritt, Lake Merritt BART, Laney College, AC Transit Bus, and easy access to I-880, I-980, and I-580.', 'The unit features a large one bedroom and additional space that can be used as a home office or a second bedroom.', "We're expecting this one to go quickly!!", "If you're interested to tour and apply, please reach out to Betty via email at", 'show contact info', 'or via phone at', 'show contact info', 'We ask that you drive by the property to acquaint yourself with the neighborhood and exterior of the home.', 'Description:', '1018 4th Avenue, #206 Oakland 94606', '1 bed, 1 bath | 1,393 square feet condo', 'Freshly updated!', 'New flooring/paint/fixtures/etc.', 'Located near Lake Merritt', '1 gated parking space | Street parking is also available', 'Designer couch and dining table included from KCC Modern in West Berkeley', 'New in-unit washer/dryer', 'New Dishwasher', 'New Gas Stove', 'Water, Garbage, Sewer & parking included', 'Walking distance to restaurants, bars, shopping centers, Lake Merritt, Laney Bart station, Laney College, AC Transit Bus, and easy access to I-880, I-980, and I-580.', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $3,500 per month', 'Lease Term: 12 month', 'Available: Now', 'Security Deposit: 1-month rent', 'Income Requirement: 2.5x the rental rate', 'Pet Policy: No size limit, 2 pets per household, Aggressive breed restrictions.', 'Pet Fees: $500 Pet deposit, Cat - $50 per month | Dog - $75 per month']
